description:
“I don’t pretend to be someone I’m not,” Jay said. “I like being gay... it’s more fun and you’re able to get away with a lot more!”

“Oh yeah?” I said. I liked this guy already.

“Yeah... It’s really interesting…somehow everything we do ends up looking a lot more adorable than if a straight guy did it!"

One thing I noticed about Jay right away is that he has a lot of confidence. He has a hot, muscular body but I think his attitude is way more sexy!

“I’ve always known that I was gay,” he said. “I remember knowing at a very young age.”

Jay is a gymnast, something he’s been doing since he was a kid. He’s actually pretty good and he competed at the collegiate level.

“I love doing it,” he said. “But it can be distracting!”

“How so?”

“Those boys are hot!”

I had a good day with Jay. He really made me laugh!
title: Jay
